title: Income Tax department conducts searches at the office of Hero MotoCorp, Pawan Munjal
description: Sources in the Income Tax department said that a team of officials have reached multiple locations related to office premises of Hero motocorp, in Gurugram, Delhi and also residence of executives of the company. While tax officials have maintained that these searches are in connection with alleged tax evasion, they refused to divulge further details on that.
